column4: Ubuntu sees my gamepad as soon as I plug it in, what is it your try'n to make it do?
lol
work. I'm trying to make it work.
:P
ok but work how? what app are you trying to use it with?
eventually, I'd like to get it working with qjoypad so I can use it in place of my keyboard/mouse for gaming
when you plug it in and run dmesg do you see something like http://paste.ubuntu.com/275571/
much more than that, but yes, that is also there
yeah theres a bunch of stuff before that, but at least we know the system sees the pad
zsnes lets me set the controls, but only start works, none of the other buttons work
I probably have something conflicting--I've tried several things thus far
I'm not familliar with the nes emu's, my pad does work fine with mame though
have you checked the zsnes forums? theres a whole section on controllers there
most refer to windows :P
want to help me make sense of these instructions? http://ubuntu.bryanludvigsen.com/?p=41
can someone help me with these instructions: http://ubuntu.bryanludvigsen.com/?p=41 or help me set up a dev with these source files: http://qjoypad.sourceforge.net/#download brb
back
I tried to install/build zsnes but it does not seem to like my 64bit proc
did you try through add/remove?
haven't tried 64 bit in a loooong time, but I've got the pc for it
no actuall, I was try'n to do a build but I'll grab from repos
BOOO! No 64bit support or option for zsnes
lame! sorry, I'm in and out as it's time for the kids to go to bed
